sobre-mi.descripcion: I'm a FrontEnd Developer with experience in React.js, Angular, and WordPress, focused on creating modern, accessible, and user-centered interfaces. I completed courses in JavaScript, React.js, Angular, and WordPress at Coderhouse, where I gained skills in building dynamic websites and Single Page Applications (SPA) with state management, protected routes, and reactive forms. I'm passionate about turning ideas into functional digital experiences using technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and Angular. I also have experience in technical SEO with Yoast SEO (meta descriptions, keywords, Open Graph), and in implementing web accessibility following WCAG guidelines to ensure inclusive and well-ranked websites.
sobre-mi.cvBoton: Take a look at my CV

tarjetas.descripcion: Modern, fast and custom websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React. Responsive design and SEO optimization.
Installation, customization and optimization of WordPress sites. Perfect for blogs, business sites and landing pages.

servicios.cta: Want a professional website? Contact me for a free quote!
